headline: Health Care Down on Defensive Bias -- Health Care Roundup
summary: Health-care companies fell, but not by as much as the broad market, amid a rotation back into the out-of-favor defensive sector. Walgreen Boots Alliance surged after the drug-store chain's...

headline: Top Stock Movers Now: Constellation Brands, Allstate, Delta Air Lines, and More
summary: U.S. equities slumped at midday after the December jobs report came in higher than anticipated, putting more Federal Reserve rate cuts in doubt.

headline: AbbVie Takes $3.5B Impairment Charge for Failed Schizophrenia Drug
summary: AbbVie said it would take a $3.5 billion dollar impairment charge related to the failure of a drug it acquired in its purchase of Cerevel Therapeutics.

raw.headline: AbbVie Takes $3.5B Impairment Charge for Failed Schizophrenia Drug
raw.summary: AbbVie said it would take a $3.5 billion dollar impairment charge related to the failure of a drug it acquired in its purchase of Cerevel Therapeutics.

headline: AbbVie to Post $3.5 Billion Impairment Charge on Failed Cerevel Drug
summary: AbbVie said the impairment charge is related to last year’s $8.7 billion bet on Cerevel following the failure of the deal’s key drug candidate, emraclidine, a schizophrenia treatment .

raw.headline: AbbVie to Post $3.5 Billion Impairment Charge on Failed Cerevel Drug
raw.summary: AbbVie said the impairment charge is related to last year’s $8.7 billion bet on Cerevel following the failure of the deal’s key drug candidate, emraclidine, a schizophrenia treatment .

headline: Pfizer’s PD-1 drug succeeds; AbbVie writes down $3.5B in Cerevel assets
summary: Sasanlimab, a subcutaneous immunotherapy developed by Pfizer, could help treat bladder cancer. Elsewhere, Royalty Pharma moved to simplify its corporate structure and Biogen made another hire.

raw.headline: Pfizer’s PD-1 drug succeeds; AbbVie writes down $3.5B in Cerevel assets
raw.summary: Sasanlimab, a subcutaneous immunotherapy developed by Pfizer, could help treat bladder cancer. Elsewhere, Royalty Pharma moved to simplify its corporate structure and Biogen made another hire.
